ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 teaspoon chili powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon ground cumin, or more to taste
1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
des: "A quick side dish to serve with fish tacos or grilled chicken; serve in small bowls or use slotted spoon to plate alongside fish tacos or grilled chicken."
ins: Stir black beans, tomatoes, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, and garlic powder together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook until the tomatoes soften, 10 to 15 minutes.
